projects.name: UrbanGreens
projects.description: A platform that connects landowners to rent rooftop spaces for sustainable farming. Providing a system that allows individual to share land ownership, featuring filter functionality based on area, location, price, and land type, and crop predictions utilizing soil quality and seasonal data. Providing a chatroom to communicate and collaborate effectively.

projects.name: Car Showcase
projects.description: Introduced an intuitive platform enabling users to explore from over more than 100 varieties of cars. Developed and integrated a user-friendly fuel preference filter (gas, hybrid, electric) for the car selection process.

projects.name: HackSRM 4.0 Website
projects.description: Oversaw Technical and Design Team in executing targeted campaigns, boosting HackSRM Hackathon visibility, and optimizing the registration process for managerial appeal. Drove a substantial increase in website traffic, attracting over 4000 visitors, and facilitated 500+ registrations within a 10-day period.

experiences.description: Developed a investment platform called PehlaStake designed to cater to a diverse user base, including Investors, Businesses, Franchise, Ideation. Solely responsible for frontend development, implementing the complete frontend functionality and coding the entire product design while ensuring attractive, user-friendly interfaces using responsive design principles for a smooth experience on all devices.
Created and launched Pentadots Official website, a tailored IT business services platform, Solely designed and implemented a professional blog showcasing Pentadots expertise.
